alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 7:19AM CDT until July 21 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... Southern Delaware County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northern Adair County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Cherokee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 815 AM CDT. * At 719 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Rose to near Leach to 5 miles southwest of Scraper, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Siloam Springs... Gentry... Decatur... West Siloam Springs... Colcord... Kansas... Highfill... Watts... Oaks... Springtown... Cincinnati... Leach... Scraper... Twin Oaks... Lake Francis... Fairmount... Ballard... Wedington... Gallitin... Rhea... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
